name: Bristol Games Social
description: A Meetup group where games fanatics, hobbyists, developers and casual players can get together and enjoy playing in a social setting. This is an inclusive group where everybody is welcome.
details: If you want to bring your own game, please do. If you have a game that you would like to play test, bring it and ask around, you might just find some peeps that will be happy to help.

location.address: The Open Arms, 24 St Michael's Hill, Bristol BS2 8DX

booking.details: Please book a space on Meetup via the link above.
